MonsterTrait.Name: Cunning Action
MonsterTrait.Text: A ratfolk rogue can use a bonus action to Dash, Disengage, or Hide.

MonsterTrait.Name: Nimbleness
MonsterTrait.Text: A ratfolk rogue can move through the space of any creature size Medium or larger.

MonsterTrait.Name: Pack Tactics
MonsterTrait.Text: A ratfolk rogue has advantage on its attack roll against a creature if at least one of the ratfolk's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally is capable of attacking.

MonsterTrait.Name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
MonsterTrait.Text: A ratfolk rogue deals an extra 3 (1d6) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of one of its allies that isn't incapacitated and the rogue doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

MonsterAction.Name: Dagger
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.

MonsterAction.Name: Light Crossbow
MonsterAction.Text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage.

MonsterAction.Name: Rat Dagger Flurry
MonsterAction.Text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 20/60 ft., three targets. Hit: 7 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.
